tweets.text:
🎾 #WIMBLEDON is here! We are going to be making quite the racket, as we Serve up Some ace Summer Sports Camp Deals! - let's get underway!

1. How many tennis puns can you fit
into a sentence? - if you can prodeuce
more than 5 we will give you £5 off
of a day at our Sports Camp! https://t.co/kMCqVC8n23

🖼 Guess who’s back!?

Mr. Spratt makes his return to @ftsportsltd after a short break from full-time Sports Coaching in style as he headed to District Sports with Mr. Lumsdon & @FleetvilleSport for a record-breaking week! 🏆

Welcome back Mr. S! 🌱 https://t.co/FPAQ8FKsjf

urls.title: Sports Camp | finishingtouchsports
urls.description: 'the finishing touch to your childhood of sport' A variety of sports activities, skill challenges and mini games focused on physical & social well-being, active development and our sporting values. Football, Dodgeball, Tag Rugby, Netball, Basketball, Tennis, Kwik Cricket, Rounders, Athletics, Pop Lacrosse, Tri-Golf, Volleyball, Badminton, Handball, Team Building & more! Our Sports Camps run from Fleetville Junior School in St. Albans, Herts. Host Locations are open to all schools and do not hold exclusivity

tweets.text:
LINE UP REVEALED! 📝 

It’s Festival Season! - and @ftsportsltd are getting into the spirit of the occasion with our ‘Festival of Sport’ celebration at our Summer Sports Camp! ☀️🎉 

Watch out #glastonbury! 😂

✍️ Sign Up Now!
https://t.co/u5eEoavILM https://t.co/IDJAZDIgM3

A great day at District Sports! ☀️ 

We found time for an @ftsportsltd ‘throw off’ w/ our Active Schools, @FleetvilleJnr & @Wheatfields_ ! ⚾️…

1. Yes, I posted as I won 👀
2. Miss T, how’s the tan? ☀️ 
3. Mr. S, watch that line! ✖️
4. Miss W, 100m sprint Thu for overall win? 😅 https://t.co/b8QckrTCrR

🏏 Howzat for a Monday! 

It was great fun in the summer sunshine as our Y3-6 Cricket & Rounders Club at @FleetvilleJnr/@FleetvilleSport took to the field for a T10 special! 

#idontlikecricketiloveit ❤️ https://t.co/jMC62ECkTG

Do Do Do Do Do, Mr. Mortimer! 🎵 

https://t.co/LsvRDx2Fdo

157 children stay active with @ftsportsltd every Friday afternoon in our #ftsactiveschools!

🤾 @Wheatfields_ Dodgeball
🤾🏻‍♂️ @FleetvilleJnr Dodgeball
⚽️ Wheatfields Infants Football

#proud 💙
#stayactive 🏃‍♀️ 
#findyourfinishingtouch 👊 https://t.co/Jq8LVIRfwJ

🎂 HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO US!
• est. 2016 

On this day, in 2016, the ‘finishing touches’ (see what we did there) were put in place for this very company to be founded! 

6 Years on, we now provide active opportunities to over 1000 children per week!

#proud 💙
#HappyBirthday 🎉 https://t.co/0Sq72d0GGQ

As the #jubileeweekend comes to a end, it doesn’t mean the excitement does…

Over to you Ma’am to present what’s coming up on the return to ‘Summer 2’ in our Active Schools…

@Wheatfields_
@FleetvilleJnr

#ActiveSchools
#ExtraCurricular
#SchoolClubs
#StAlbans 
#Jubilee
#Queen https://t.co/CosGmjezWW

Thanks to Freya for inviting me along to @FleetvilleJnr and infant schools' #JubileeCelebration #streetparty on behalf of the school council. I enjoyed the cakes 🧁 & playing the 'Queen Fruit Machine' game - ingenious! https://t.co/yio9vqPY6Z
Mr. Watters is stealing the show at Y5/6 Football at @FleetvilleSport with his cameos lately…😂🦂👏 https://t.co/fzfIxiqIiZ

Our Active Schools provisions for Summer Term (2) are now available to over 1️⃣1️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ children! 🤩🥳

#ActiveSchools https://t.co/KUKNozwtgU

urls.title: Sports Camp | finishingtouchsports
urls.description: 'the finishing touch to your childhood of sport' A variety of sports activities, skill challenges and mini games focused on physical & social well-being, active development and our sporting values. Football, Dodgeball, Tag Rugby, Netball, Basketball, Tennis, Kwik Cricket, Rounders, Athletics, Pop Lacrosse, Tri-Golf, Volleyball, Badminton, Handball, Team Building & more! Our Sports Camps run from Fleetville Junior School in St. Albans, Herts. Host Locations are open to all schools and do not hold exclusivity

tweets.text:
‼️BOOK NOW!
#SportsCamp ⛅️ 

A Variety of Sports Activities, Skill Challenges & Mini Games focused on physical & social well-being, active development & our fts:values.

*WE ARE NOW OPEN TO RECEPTION 
REC - Year 6 (Primary Year Group) 

https://t.co/u5eEoavILM

#halfterm https://t.co/AoilQrKx0m

Today, at Y5/6 ⚽️ Club, our session concluded w/ the celebration of members of @FleetvilleSport who were victorious in the St. Albans Cup yesterday!

Our Coach, Miss Pullan also shared her memories of winning the competition as captain of @FleetvilleJnr in 2016! 

#generations 👊 https://t.co/skQBRKXsxf
3 girls from the pictured squad now work as Junior Lead Coaches for @ftsportsltd at @FleetvilleJnr and @Wheatfields_, it truly is #oncefleetvilleforeverfleetville! 👊 https://t.co/PF8Qqsc7vH

Yesterday we hosted the @StAlbans_SSP Tri-Golf tournament with 4 different primary schools participating. The day was guided by the brilliant Sports Leaders of @LoretoStAlbans - thank you for such a fun experience! We are looking forward to the finals ⛳️🏌️‍♂️

#oaklands100 #stalbans https://t.co/OQFYLQVPbv

Over 40 participants at our opening Cricket/Rounders Active Club at @FleetvilleJnr/@FleetvilleSport this summer term! Our Y5/6’s braved the showers on the school field for a full game of Kwik-Cricket as our Y3/4’s took on Mr. Lumsdon’s Rapid Fire Competition in the Sportshall! 🏏 https://t.co/pEgw64p8TK

Currently, 3️⃣2️⃣8️⃣ children have signed up to our Active School Provisions (After School), alongside our Free Lunch Clubs (@Wheatfields_) open to 3️⃣6️⃣0️⃣ children from Mon-Thu!

That’s 6️⃣8️⃣8️⃣ active children per week with @ftsportsltd in our Active Schools this Summer Term!

… https://t.co/R87NB8Tf6T

What a way to start the day at Sports Camp today! 🥷…

@ftsportsltd does @ninjawarrioruk!

#NinjaWarrior 
#findyourfinishingtouch https://t.co/I0lLpKoQeZ

A great day of football on #NonLeagueDay at @maidstoneunited v @stalbanscityfc in a 5-goal thriller⚽️

Great to see our coach, Mr. Lankshear on-field and also to catch up with an old friend (and my first ever boss!) Matt!

C. Lumsdon
Director/Owner https://t.co/GpsGkbV2xg

Our Events Manager, Mr. Sandiford made a guest appearance for our final Dodgeball Club today at his former school as a child, @FleetvilleJnr!

We took our Dodgeball tournament to the field where over 5️⃣0️⃣ participants enjoyed a round-robin competition!

… https://t.co/YNazHtcp6a

☀️ Our Y5/6 Football Club sprung into action in the spring sunshine for tournament week!

4️⃣8️⃣ active children at our @FleetvilleJnr Club!

#activeschools 📚 
#sunsout ☀️ https://t.co/JTe7B4zqy5

So great to see our #activeschools promoting and implementing sports values, skill and teamwork in the St. Albans Cup Quarter Final at @FleetvilleJnr today! 

Well done to both @FleetvilleSport and @Wheatfields_! ⚽️👏 https://t.co/NaQBzPtolq

#FinishingTouchSportsDerby 😂⚽️

Best of luck to both of our #activeschools in today’s Quarter Final clash in the sunshine! ☀️ 

The fixture will be officiated by our Apprentice Coach and @Verulam_PE sports ambassador, Jacob H.

Looking forward to seeing the action unfold! 👊 https://t.co/vGmM9OEw91

EASTER CAMP GIVEAWAY 🎉🐣

https://t.co/fT23lsTJJE

RED NOSE DAY 🔴!
#rednoseday #dodgeballtournament https://t.co/N5JQ1oosl9

SIGN UP NOW!

✍️ TO BE CONTINUED…
